content.detailedDescription:
On october 29 2010,at approximately 6:45pm my husband and i were driving down 70 hwy east(independence).We noticed 5 bright white lights in a row flying above us on the north side of the car.We noticed them because they were very bright and silvery not like anything we have ever seen.They were flying fairly low for aircraft. they flew in perfect unison from northeast to south east until they crossed over in front of us  where 291 hwy crosses 70 hwy. when they crossed 70 all but one fell back together in a cluster with the fifth one out in front away from the rest and continued to move east. as we turned south off of 70 hwy onto little blue parkway they stopped just a few miles east of us just south of 70 over northwest blue springs.They again lined up in a row shoulder to shoulder.
then after a moment of staying motionless the moved into a circle formation and rotated around in a tight circle (at an angle)and moved out from each other just a little. as they did this one of them shot down to the ground, it looked kind of like shooting star shot down to the ground and back up. they seemed to get a little larger/ brighter when they were circling around.At this point we got really excited we knew that it was a ufo.Then we turned south on little blue parkway and we lost sight of them.
content.summary: Multiple lights/craft over independence blue springs area.

content.detailedDescription: After me and my husband went to lunch, we headed down to my inlaws house for a visit, driving towards the sun, my husband pointed out this metal looking egg/oval type object in the sky , just under the sun , it was still not moving,  it was quite far away but still could see the shape clearly. so i assume it was very big. we drive down the road for about another 5 secs, and it was like it faded away.  we couldnt believe our eyes, we get to the red light down the road, turn left, drive a little more and we see it again hovering. and it faded once more.  clear blue skys no clouds what so ever.
content.summary: Egg/oval in sky, still, then disappered before my eyes

content.detailedDescription:
The date this event occurred is not accurate. it either occurred sometime over christmas break 1985 or 1986. it was very cold and clear with a stiff breeze and my two younger sisters and i decided to ice skate on a small farm pond. 

when we left the house peter jennings was signing off so it was almost 7 p.M. when we got to the ice i heard some snowmobiles running down a trail about 400 yards downhill from our location. i immediately noticed that approximately 10 feet above them there were twinkling lights so i thought what kind of banner antenna thing are they carrying?

my youngest sister needed help with her skates so i began to help her but kept glancing toward the snowmobiles. they began to move through a hollow of trees and i couldn't see them and realized that the light was moving away from them, but i still thought it was being caused by the snowmobiles headlights? 

i asked my other sister who was skating around the pond what she thought was causing the lights. she spots a jet going overhead and informs me it's just a plane, they always look like that. we start arguing, but i don't see the lights any more...So i'm just thinking some weird atmospheric event when all of a sudden i see it directly overhead. i'm screaming there it is, run. the sister i was fighting with is all like you're just trying to scare me and skates off to the far end of the pond.

i'm running off the pond into knee deep snow. i glance back my youngest sister is standing looking up at this triangle that is lit on three corners with white lights. it looked like you could see the stars through it and it's getting lower. 

the sister who i was fighting with is now trying to listen to me and get off the ice. i realize there is no way my youngest sister can run through that snow with skates on. i run back onto the ice and drag them into the snow at the side of the ice. i toss a few handfuls of grass and snow on top of us and we are all laying on the ice staring up at this thing, that looks like it is going to land right on top of us.

i start praying all the prayers i ever learned mostly like please help us god and mary, mother of god, the choirs of angels all the saints and people who have died before us.

it hovers over us and than all of a sudden it flashes and the only thing i can describe it like was as if a big poloroid flash cube went off, the kind, where you can't see too well for awhile. the triangle gradually lifted off. it flew off over our house hesitated over the house and as it got further away it began to look like a twinkling strange reflection again.

when it was over the house i was able to see that it was a very metal looking craft of some sort. it was about two hay wagons wide. there was no markings or anything to give it away as man made.

we all started to laugh and say we were going to be in some alien's photo album of my trip to earth. we walked back up to the house with our skates on. at this point my youngest sister asked what was that? i realized we weren't acting quite right so i wrote everything down and think its the only reason i remember it well. also jeopardy was on when we got back to the house so i don't think we had lost time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle-three white lights-like a reflection

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside of work to have a smoke and looked east - northeast since something caught my eye.  sun was setting in the west and there was a low, dark cloud deck, illuminated with sunshine.  there were two sets of 3 low and fast flying orbs or lights.  the first three were about 25 degrees above horizon moving from east to northwest in a triangle pattern.  the second set appeared out of low cloud deck, behind the first, then proceeded to be in triangle formation following first, when it stopped.  it reversed course and headed almost due east, with one light almost staying behind and stationary.

i work near o'hare airport and there were planes in the sky, but these were definitely not aircraft.
content.summary: Orbs & lights near o'hare

content.detailedDescription:
Since i was twelve years old, i've seen objects on the sky, but that day!.
i been watching these spheres for a wile already, i mean for years, but its hard to talk about it with your own family, and what to say about your friends, they think you're crazy, well i have two grandkids, and since i'm always playing with them, i started showing them those spheres i was looking at once in a wile on the sky, and i was telling them they were balloons, you know they're kids, so i didn't want'em to go around and telling other kids they're watching ufos, and after a while they were the ones telling me that there was a balloon on the sky, and that wasn't moving, so we looked for it and yes there it was, it was like a white balloon just sitting there in the sky without any movement at all and then disappeared, and these is been going on for a while, and we see'em very often. but on july 24 we got to see up to 24 of them in a period of time of 3 to 4 hrs, it was on july 24 2010 from 4 pm till 7 pm. and last saturday october 30th around 1 pm, we saw another one, well i said we, because this time i got to show it to my son my wife my daughter in law and the kids, but this one was different to the other ones this one was shining and was like transforming, sometimes it was a sphere with something that looks like a tail hanging from it, and sometimes like a sphere, but there were times that it looked like a disk and was shining, and sometimes disappearing from our view, and this weekend on sunday afternoon we realized they also fly kind of low, almost ground touching, well not that low but we can say maybe a couple hundred feet above ground level. i tried to take video, but it's very hard to focus those small spheres on the sky, but i manage to take video from two of them, but maybe only for 2 or 3 seconds, also there's a web site called, earthcam, with cameras streaming live images from different parts of the world, i normally use that page to set up a live image on my computer as a wallpaper, and  the camera i normally use in that page is in chile, south america, i type in the word patagonia and it starts streaming live video, and you'll be amazed by the images you get to see  there. "ufo" images (you'll see'em when you less expected) and it gives you the option to save the image like a picture, i have taken a couple of pictures where you get to see what i'm talking about, give it the try and find out for your self, this is not every day, and its only when the camera is pointing to the mountains, normally from 9:00 am til noon. los angeles local time, now if you want to see those spheres i'm talking about, you can do it. it takes time but specially you have to be patient.And here in california i normally see'em from 4 pm to 7 pm its when i get to my son's house after work and i start playing with the kids at the front yard,and also at nigh they can be seen at any time, normally they're red color at night.You'll recognize'em by the way they move or fly, very different to any airplane. on day time they're normally white color, but once in a while we get to see'em on blue or red color,and some times you see'em changing color from white to red or yellow. again it takes time and patient. also i'm attaching 3 pictures, two of them are from the same object, but if you see on one of the pictures the object is closer to the edge than the other one, because it was moving up and down, and like i said the web site gives you the option to take pictures in real time while streaming, now on the other picture you'll see two objects in the center of the image, disk shaped and also two more in the right hand side at the bottom of the same image. well. if you really want to see it for your self keep looking up, or go to the web site i mentioned before. false, truth, is up to you to decide.
content.summary: Spheres moving around in different directions

content.detailedDescription: A close friend (*name removed--cms/sg) called me and asked me too look up in the sky around 1:30pm on nov.2nd. he said it looked like a flame in the sky!I looked up and couldnt see what he was seeing so i called him back and he told me to look towards the sun so i did and couldnt believe what i saw.There was 7 silver spheres flying and hovering so i ran to get my camera and to my suprise there was alot of them way more than 7 flying and hovering. i was able to view them for a couple of hours i even had my neighbors whole family come to yard and let them look through my camera and they were shocked too.I was able to capture this event on film but it really shocked me when i saw the pics because there must be hundreds of them and there is a huge cluster of them also that must be in the hundreds it self.These spheres were moving in every direction they would go fast than stop and move again and some would hover and then move towards the direction of the sun.I have never seen anything like this in all of my life this was mindblowing and unexplainable.These things were very high up in the sky but you could see them with the naked eye and they seemed to go with the direction of the sun.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Between 2pm and 5pm nov.2nd i saw many silver sphere's flying and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw the object through a window in my house in englewood, california moving from an east-north east direction in a straight line towards los angeles international airport and at first i thought it was a cluster of thin metallic plastic party balloons which had either been released or had escaped.  as i looked closer, they seemed to look "funny" somehow.  they also seemed to be tumbling as a group in the sky and i realized they were moving too fast, unless there was a high speed wind up where they were.  there was no breeze or wind on the ground.  later i realized that as they had been heading directly for the pacific ocean, the wind would have been blowing from west to east, so they would have been traveling against the wind.

i grabbed my camera (a canon t2i with a tamron 300mm lens), ran outside and looked over the roof of my house where i estimated the object would have have reached by then, on the basis of extrapolating its motion from my window.

but i could not see it anywhere.  i was shocked by this.  i could not believe something so clearly visible could have simply disappeared in a cloudless clear blue sky and so i carefully searched the entire sky area but had to conclude it was gone!!

i then searched back to the east where i had first seen it from inside my house ��������� closer to the horizon and there it was again, apparently in the same position and traveling at the same speed and slowly tumbling.

i began to try to get pictures and video of the object as it crossed the sky in about 3 minutes.  my first view of it was at an angle of about a 45 degrees to the east and i lost sight of it when it became too small a point to see or to photograph in the west.   looking at a map later i saw that it would appear to have traveled slightly to the north of los angeles international airport and then continued out over the ocean.

i was able to get two sharp photos but no video.  using photoshop i zoomed the images of the object out to 300% and then cut and pasted one image next to the other for comparison.  you can see that the object has rotated.  i saved these two blown up images in one file and i then reduced the size of the original image to give an idea of its size of the object's appearance in the sky.

if the object had been viewable by radar, i am sure that lax will have a clear record of its movements.
content.summary: Tumbling metallic object in clear sky photographed near los angeles international airport

content.detailedDescription: At about 6:40 pm last night i was laying down outside, listening to my ipod and looking up at the night sky. as i laid there i noticed a very bright round light, almost like a planet, moving very slowly in the sky. as i watched the object coming closer to me i took out my earphones and noticed that the object made no sound. as the object flew over me i could see that it was round and was so bright that it looked like it was on fire, white fire. i watched the object for about 4-5 minutes moving slowly coming from the south and going north. i then watched the object shoot across the sky and was gone in less then a second. there is a military airbase, mcas miramar, just south of me, so i am used to seeing and hearing planes and helicopters flying over. i also attended the mcas airshow about a month ago and know that all the aircraft i saw there made a lot of noise when it flew over. this object never made a sound, even though the speed at which it took off should have broken the sound barrier.
content.summary: Very bright round object seen in the sky in the sorrento valley area of s.D.

content.detailedDescription: Onboard uss compass island ag 153 during special operations on faintail watch. i saw in our wake approximately 30 ft from the faintail an object which was lit in a green color. the size was approximately 8 ft diameter and 12 feet long. the object was submerged and stayed with the ship for approximately one hr. mind you time and size are approximate since it has been since 1972. i reported the sighting to the boson on watch on in the bridge. he relayed my report to the officer on watch. the response that i got was forget that you saw anything and do not discuss.
content.summary: In water

content.detailedDescription:
Time:  a few minutes after 5:00am (est)

atmospheric conditions: clear and unlimited visibility.

description:  red/orange object sighted in sky through my living room window.  at first i thought it to be the planet mars because it was so different from the stars in the sky, but within a few seconds of seeing the object, i noticed that it was moving, slowly, towards the south.  the object, based on approximate altitude, size, and direction, was very near to selfridge air national guard base (and perhaps over the base). 

upon determing that i was not seeing a known type of aircraft, i watched the object moving slowly to the south, and then southwest.  airspeed was very slow, and was similiar to what i am accustomed to seeing the local ch-47's fly at.  

there was absolutely no sound from the object.

the object slowly moved out of sight as its distance increased.

there were no colored lights (the red & green anticollision lights), and there was no rotating beacon, nor was there any lights at all, other than that of the object which was a red/orange glow.  the "glow" was constant, steady, and not pulsating.

this was the 3rd ufo that i have witnessed in the vacinity of selfridge in only a few years.  interestingly, the time previous to this sighting, this was the same color object, location of sighting, and this object also followed the same route out of the airspace.  but the previous sighting, the object moved at *incredible* speed not possible by an aircraft.
content.summary: Red/orange glowing object at selfridge angb

content.detailedDescription: i just want to know if any others have seen objects around the salton sea in california? i saw them two years in a row and even had a witness at the second event. most of the elderly residents seemed not to want to discuss them.... wierd. there were many!! they were very slow moving and wouldnt attract attention from most drivers. this is a very remote location and edwards af base sent jets following my call to them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Multiple objects, extended time,

content.detailedDescription: Have pictures taken by a game camera on three different days and times in two different locations
content.summary: Pictures of orbs

content.detailedDescription: Around the 8 o'clock hour on friday night, october 29th, 2010, myself and a friend observed a fast moving, solid light formation heading ne from the goose hollow area of portland, oregon. we were on the upper deck of a downtown building cooking on the grill. i've been sky watching for some time now in the hopes of spotting a flying triangle ufo. while observing the skies above, a brighter than normal light caught my attention clearing the hills of goose hollow moving north easterly. my guess is that it was very high up, probably the same height (25,000 to 35,000 feet) as a commercial airliner when it is at cruising altitude. however this object had no identifying flashing faa lights on it. it was moving very fast for an object that high to be a commercial jet as i've observed commercial jets before and they move at a much slower pace. i could not make out if there were multiple lights on it due to the distance it was at. we both observed it on its trajectory heading towards the north east for a little over a minute. we both chatted about how this could be a ufo, possibly a flying triangle due to the solid, non-flashing lights on it. as i stated though, we could not identify if the lights were in triangle formation due to the height and brightness of them. after observing for the time we did the object appeared to bank to the left. the lights turned to an orange then red and then they went out. almost as if the lights were powered down and the craft went into a dark mode. it was amazing. no commercial or private aircraft for that matter would do that. primarily because it would cause many problems for the air traffic that departs and arrives at pdx international. the object did not reappear, as we looked in all directions for about 2 minutes after that. we weren't startled by it, not spooked, just in awe that we may had just observed a ufo. i know there are military bases around the portland area, so it could have been a test craft or even a triangle ufo. anyway, it was pretty cool to see that. it definitely was not an airliner. the faa lights are a dead giveaway for any registered, commercial aircraft. this did not have anything like that. no flashing multicolored lights. just solid. anyway, thought i'd share this with you.
content.summary: Fast moving, solid light, vanished

content.detailedDescription: Where there was not a star....It seemed....That a really super bright star appeared and got brighter and then flashed out and was gone....? i'm thinking i may have witnessed a super nova ???.... i was looking almost due south slightly south south east ....From the south side of the island .
content.summary: Standing on porch in morning looking at stars.:..All of a sudden ...

content.detailedDescription: We had gotten done with trick-or-treating around 8:30 pm est in kennesaw, ga, and had left our neighbor's house (they were still standing outside talking).  i went inside and started to close some curtains and noticed a red fireball/star-like ball of light that was crossing the sky (from southwest to northeast) over the neighborhood (i'm guessing about a quarter-mile to a half-mile up).  it was bright, and looked rather weird, so i went outside to see it better (thinking at that time it was likely just a plane).  the neighbors were all looking up at it too (we exchanged a few "what is that?" type phrases).  it only took about 2-3 minutes to cross overhead.  it moved about as fast as i've seen helicopters move, but the fact it was just one bright light made it look odd.  i didn't have time to grab a camera.  i actually wasn't going to report it at all due to the lack of a photo and the fact it's path/speed resembled a helicopter or plane; however, i saw another report in ga of a very similarly-described red light in the sky that same night (titled "star like redish light tranformed to a flarelike fire ball" submitted on 11-1-2010), and perhaps these "cases" are linked. i can provide a map of it's approximate path, if needed.
content.summary: Bright red fireball/light passes over residential area

content.detailedDescription:
This object was recorded on a moultrie game camera positioned in the deep woods of n. central louisiana.  there was no one physically present and no eye witnesses, just a motion activated infrared flash digital camera.

there were four occurences where light/objects appeared in frames captured by the camera occuring during the hours of darkness on septemter, 6th, 13th, 14th & 15th.  the primary event occured on september 14th.

i am including 3 images:  

series 1: image mgdc0378.  this image is the primary image and speaks for itself.

series 2: image mgdc0372.  this image contains a shaft of light that appears in the upper left hand corner of the frame.

series 3: image mgdc0375.  this image contains a shaft of light that appears to be coming from a source in the upper center of the image projecting toward the game camera as if it were searching.

this camera was strapped to a tree overlooking a mineral block and corn that was being frequented by wild hogs and other animals.  the location is in a low area surrounded by forrest and there are no sources of light present in that area.  the camera was facing from the east to the west.

the cylindrical light in mgdc0378 appears to be spinning and based on other known objects in the frame appears to be approximately 1 - 2 liters in size.

all images were capture on a sd card and i am in posession of the card with all images as they were originally captured.

there are a number of other images of interest on this card but none as significant as the ones i'm attaching.  those images are available if you have further interest in them.
content.summary: Bright cylindrical shaped light

content.detailedDescription: My niece, nephew and i were in the post exchange parking lot of andrews afb returning to the car at approximately 2:15pm. i know this because my niece had a hair appt at 2:30pm and i remember thinking we have 15 minutes to get home. my nephew pointed out that the sky had chemtrails then he asked, "uncle mike, what is that?" i looked up and realized how bright the sun was then noticed another bright but smaller (than the sun) object off to my right. it was bright, however, not so bright you couldn't look at it. at first it appeared to be just a point of light with no apparent source, but then i immediately thought, the sun light is reflecting off something but i can't see what it is. the object was not moving, the reflection was steady. i remembered my cell phone camera and quickly pulled it out and took (2) pictures of the phenomenon. i thought to myself "wtf is that?" we left after about 2 min and i took the kids home for my nieces hair appt. when i got home i downloaded the pictures and noticed that there was a substancial time difference between when i actually took the picture and the time listed in properties which was more like the download time.
content.summary: You could see the sun reflecting off an object that was cloaked or camouflaged.

content.detailedDescription:
Very early morning, stars and moon still out. couldn't sleep, went out to hot tub. looking at sky...Noticed fast movement of transparent, sharped edged boomerang object passing over house, into cloud (one of about three small wispy clouds in the sky at the time) and didn't see it come out. it moved from the wnw to the ese, wind from due n, but clouds not moving at all. watched for it to come out of the cloud for several minutes.

my feelings. i thought it was interesting. different. i live in stephenville and have seen many different things, but nothing remotely like this.

this was on or about oct 28. only reporting because i saw report of similar object on approx the same date as i saw this. 

missing time? was out in very early morning several times that week. one morning i was very surprised at what time it was when i went back into the house. it was much later than i thought it should be, but i may have just lost track of the time or looked at the clock wrong when i went out of the house. am not sure it was even that morning.

i have never reported sightings before and have seen many interesting things. including black triangle shaped object hovering low near my house, showed to husband. he looked at it said that's interesing and went back to bed. we see so many strange things. i go to the hot tub a lot in the middle of the night (esp. between 2:00 and 5:00) when i wake up and can't go back to sleep. 

the few seconds i saw it sounds like a very short time, but it was clear, impressive and i had been looking at the sky already.
content.summary: Sharped edged, transparent, boomerang shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
well, i couldn't get 'coast-to-coast' on 640 am radio, because of the election results. dam, republicans lost. and gold is now in limbo.
  but then, i realized i could get 'coast-to-coast' on xm 165. so at 10 pm, i went to get a coffee and headed on p.C.H. to huntington beach, ca. to listen to 'coast to coast' for a couple of hours and enjoy the nice cool sea-breeze and stargaze for about 20 or 30 min.
   at the news brake, at the top of the hour around 11:59 pm, i decided
to get out of my truck, and check out the sky (jupiter) with my binoculars.
  
 while looking at jupiter, facing west, i noticed four very faint and dull stars- about the width of two fingers at arms length underneath jupiter.
  
though, i'm not sure that's a valid measurement- but it works for me.
   while thinking about reporting this sighting, i noticed on the mufon
website, that there have been other sighting, san diego and northward.

 at absolute magnitude- sun being -30, i'd say these objects- unseen to the
naked eye (with eye sight seeing around plus 5 or 7), would have been close to around a +10 to +15 magnitude... apparent or absolute- not sure.
  and since, i can't remember what the full moon is at absolute magnitude. i'd have to just say; that they just didn't give off much 'light'. the only way to see them was with binoculars.
   they (the four stars) just looked like- in the shape of- an engine of a rocket looking up from the bottom- that was orbiting earth.

    each one, looked like- almost large enough in size to eclipse jupiter.
   after about 20 minutes of looking them, i realized, i could go to sunset beach about 6 to 7 miles away and view them.
   the locations, and angles being different, but still had the objects were apparently under jupiter. 
   at huntington beach, jupiter seemed to be appearing over three oil rigs
 very wide apart. 
   at sunset beach, jupiter wasn't even near the oil rigs. and appeared over three other oil rigs further out.
   suggesting the objects under jupiter were outside earth's atmosphere.
  and since didn't have the equipment like a protractor to find the angles with me. i decided to stop at that point and get the supplies later to huntington beach and sunset beach to do a triangulation and parallax.
   sounds fun.
   though, i did check the 'stellarium' program and came up with a possible
explanation for the objects- 
         stars: hip- 9639, hip- 114855, hip- 115115.
    these stars resemble the shape and were near (and under) jupiter.
                    end of sighting report...
  i don't think i was abducted, and the objects were still there when i left. i was thinking about a lot of this stuff below...

  
   but since i don't know exactly what they were, i'm reporting the 
sighting.
    i guess i'll know for sure on november 12th when 'skyline' comes out.
    i don't normally report sightings cause i don't usually see objects that i would call 'unknown' or  ufos.
                     
    but using the 'foia' in the early 1980's, the fbi sent me a ufo document in 1984-5, claiming that the air force had 3 dead aliens in silver metallic uniforms- referring to the roswell incident in 1947.  
    i think the air force wanted the fbi to believe they had dead aliens
to create an allusion. to cover up the captured of german made craft, i've seen pictures of on the internet.
    one consistant thing, i've noticed, ufo's always land in the most odd places- mountains, swamps, desert areas, farms of many acres, etc
   are they 'drug' running? cops never seem to catch them..
     and why do they seem to be using astrology?
  like the kenneth arnold chart, which seemed predict the 'challenger' disaster-
 'bouncing light off the moon from the sun hits 'uranus' transit- 18 degrees sagittarius.'
 
 'majestic 12', seems to be a horoscope of 12 ships coming into port in messina, italy ,october 1st, 1347, maybe at 11:02 am.
   600 years before the group, majestic 12, is mentioned.
   what? aliens gave us the 'bubonic plague'? like cortez? and the spanish flu?
   and the 12 ships coming into port would look kind of 'majestic' to the people living there, up until they talked to the sailors and got sick themselves.
   the horoscope has good friday- earth day, 2011 on it. so red alert
on april 22nd, 2011.
    the chart also has predicted events of this past month, i just didn't know what they were or where, or whether to believe the chart was being used..
   though, i have an idea- how that work. one way using the part of fortune, and using combinations of charts to triangulate the general day, time and location. a lot of effort.
   on 9-11 the usa chart was very active, as well as the chart of japan attacking china. july 07th, 1937.  7x7 is 49.   july 1952, plus 49 years is 2001. thus 3 ufo's over andrews air force base.
   and a japanese-american designed the world trade center.
    
   but on the oct 1st, 1347 in messina, italy chart.
 things like the spanish flu... 
     pearl harbor...
     invasion of poland.. and a lot of other stuff are on it.
    plus, aliens are real, they seem to be travel 30 plus trillion miles to earth, and while in earth's atmosphere, the f-16 size objects, don't seem to travel at  or near supersonic speed.
   accept maybe, july 1952, when one of three ufo's traveling at 100 mph accelerates to mach 9 traveling a distance of 11.1 miles. if true, a lot of windows would have been shattered.
   the speed was said to be 7300 mph subtract 100 mph is 7200.
  the world trade center- tower one is complete in 19'72'.
   tower two, south, is completed in 19'73'
     19 terrorist' 72-73. or maybe flight 19 in 1945, which never landed.
  terrorist didn't want to learn how to land.
     mach 9 @ 11.1 miles ?  andrews air force base to riverdale, md.
 google suggested it was 11.1 miles to the airport, when i first noticed.
   of course, google also has other milage data too.
   sorry, about all of this nonsense, there's to much to say and show to continue.. i'd have to write an astrology book..
   the minds of these people, (terrorist), pattern wise, are almost as wacky as my mind.
    by the way,  i don't the military, white house, or the japanese planned
9-11. i think the nazi's did. pissed off about the 'spanish flu', the u.S.
gave them. 50 million civilians in europe died. though, i do think someone hired al-qaeda- as crazy as it sounds, offering gold as payment.

   see wikipedia- for world trade center data.
   see youtube-   rod serling and jacques vallee's, ufo lecture on 
   youtube.
   fbi document see new mexico lobo, august 1985 or ufo newsclipping service, november 1985.
   'the black death', by john aberth.
   do correlation between the us unemployment rate, jan 1, 1948 to present time and the accumulative price of gold each year since 1948.
   both variables rise together! and since 9-11, it looks like a 'madoff' graph. see kitco.Com for gold info.

   and that's what i was thinking about..
content.summary: 4 very faint and dull sphere, 3 in the shape of triangle- the 4 outside it- 2 fingers under jupiter at arms length.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my friend's porch with my friend while he was talking to his girlfriend on the phone. all of the sudden there was a bright light shaped like a diamond that appeared above our heads. my friend's girlfriend said she saw the shape too. all of a sudden it cast a blinding light on us, and i can't remember anything else. can you please tell me what has happened? i dont want it to happen again, if there is anything you can do please help us.
content.summary: I was sitting on the porch with my friend and a light come towards us shaped like a diamond and took us away.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10:20-10:30pm. nov. 2, 2010. pacific time. walnut, ca.
was passenger in car. we saw it low in the sky. we pulled over in parking lot to look at it. 

saw orange glowing object in the sky. this was definitely not a plane, not a helicopter, not a star. looked like giant fireball. sort of bobbed in the sky. was low, then went higher in the sky and glowed brighter and brighter.  then suddenly one piece fell off, dripped off almost, then another piece fell. these two pieces went straight downward. then a third piece drifted diagonally. and the main thing was gone, totally. as if it were comprised of those 3 pieces. when we saw that, whoa. what kind of craft drips off stuff, seemed like embers falling, except for that 3rd piece which did not fall straight down, but flew diagonally. 

no noise. i thought the thing looked sort of like a soft roundish diamond shape, but it was hard to tell because it was glowing so brightly, whitish in the middle and orange at the edges.
content.summary: Orange glow, glowed brighter and hovered and then broke up into three pieces, 2 went straight down, one piece flew diagonally

content.detailedDescription:
Well i had a crazy dream this morning and it was me unveiling ufo's very weird but i was telling my wife about it and telling her the true name of yahwey outside our place of living and i told her i saw 3 ufos flying together but in triangle form like *
                                  * * but alittle further apart but they were flying one would move alittle bit and the other two in back would follow behind approximately above casiopia the constellation sorry about spelling but anyways then we noticed to the right of us crazy lights coming towards our way ..... each dot signifies how many colors we could see white,blue,orange,red,cyan
it started to move towards us than all the sudden the lights stop blinking and it starts to move towards my wife and i as i started telling her this is how my dream started i had a day ja vu from that dream at that exact moment than it was as if it turned into a ball of fire and started to head closer and closer to us than all the sudden it quikly turned left and it stopped the ball of fire thing and started to blink and went to the left a plane not far at all from this object flew over the top of it. all the sudden it turned into a ball of fire and went to the right way passed the plane blinking normal blue and white and red at the wings. it shot over within a blink of an eye and started to move closer towards the rockford airport direction than my wife and i wanted to get in the car to go chase it but by the time she ran in and got the keys we lost sight of it no cameras no pictures only with our very own eyes this is not the first time we have seen these flying objects but i decided to start recording them now for the sake that people really need to know our government is hiding these ufo's and the true name of our savior is yahwey and when you start to speak his nameand pray you really do start seeing these things im not joking also you should really look at the clouds sometimes they cloak in our clouds and some can even look like clouds we really need to know the truth and that we are not alone and i think the ancient people knew that also i do believe that we do have a underwater civilization that we dont know of but you can definitely check the records of the navy of uso's. back in egypt as everyone should know we were enslaved by water like creatures and yahwey helped us escape from there clutches we built false gods and worshipped them, that is against the commandments yahwey gave us and if you believe in the city of atlantis than this will come to no suprise to you we are definitely not alone!
content.summary: Outside our place of living

content.detailedDescription:
Eran mas o menos las 9 y tantos de la nochee estaba saliendo de el ba���o cuando de repentee veo una estrella fugaz pero mas fuerte de lo normal y de repente pido un deseoo y al minuto vuelvo a mirar al cielo y habia una luzz que parecia una estrellaa pero no era estrella porque despues de la estrella fugaz el cielo se habia nubladoi como queriendo llover y buenoo estuvo un tiempode 15 0 19 minutos mas o menos

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in a yard on green lake wiconsin with my family
i had binoculers and i was looking out onto the lake
i noticed a jet flaying obove with streems of smoke behind like we all see but when i looked closly in front of the jet aprox .25 inche as seen from binoculers, mayby .5 inches  as seen with a naked eye  i saw a heat signature from where the exsost would be from another craft, and the closer i looked i could somewhat makeout where the plain should be in front of that and it seemed like there was a atmisfiric distubance where the plain should have bin. i supose it was a militery test flight of an invisible plain with a chser plain so u would not notice the heat signature because the second jet was flying in the same path as the invisible one and the leaving the smoke trail.  that is my story i showed it to my wife and son they agreed on what i saw when i showed them. 
             
                    ( ----->  = x-------)
( >) is the plain i could see (=) is the heat signature (x) is where the siloet of invisible plain was 
the plains where flying in a stragight line id say 1200 to 2000 mph 50,000 ft
at first it looked like the plain i could see was spliting up the air in front of it that is when i noticed something was there.
content.summary: In visible  with slight heat streams and a chaser jet behind it

content.detailedDescription: Im 21 years old and i live in currambine which is a suburb about 35min north of the city of perth, western australia. i was sitting down watching television and for some reason i just decided to head out the back and catch a photo of the sunsetting(only with my iphone, im not a photographer). after taking the shot i looked at the photo and this extra translucent anomaly appeared in the photo which was not visible in the sky? at first i thought i had just captured a comet/meteor but when i transfered the photo onto my macbook it looks like something more. there are 4 distinctively brighter "dots" and they are relatively uniform in seperation?
content.summary: Anomaly was captured by camera(accidentally) when i was taking a picture of the sunset, not visible to the eye?

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i have been ufo hunting since my mother had seen her first one and quite a few after. today we found a nice dark spot in town around seven thirty and looked into the horizon where we spotted two orbs. one was a rather bright star that suddenly went out, the other, not two seconds after the first, started up red and moved south to north. it went out, glowed really bright then went out again. my mother and i soon left for home after the mild excitment. this is were the real fun happened! not five minutes after making it home we look to the sky one last time, my mother grabs me and points to the sky yelling at me to look. there was a black triangle with seven lights (one in the front and three on either side. very dim i might add) roughly three stories up, not making any sound, cruising directly over us (north to south). it all happened in about five seconds but that was enough to have me jumping up and down screaming about how awsome it all was and my mother awstruck asking if i saw it. we believe our excitment from the other two may have brought on the third one to come so close. just a theory. it was definatly a triangle though, it blocked out stars behind it and disappeared behind the trees. today was a day to be had!
content.summary: Black triangle cruised over apartment.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear evening, not a cloud in the sky.  i was sitting at our table outside talking with my son as he sat on the roof of my jeep liberty (yes,the roof)  i was facing west when i spotted the two bright lights. i thought they were bright stars but then they were way too close to be stars.  
i watched the lights as they seemed to hover, completely still....I could not make out a specific shape of them, they were to bright.  the lights seemed to be approx 4-6 miles west of my house, possibly over bird key, lido key or the gulf of mexico.
after watching the lights "hover" for several seconds i looked at my cell phone to document the time.  it was 6:49pm.  i then looked around in the sky to see if there were stars out to compare them, but there was none that i could see.  i looked back at the lights and asked my son if he saw them as well, and he did.  he commented on how bright the lights were. only one of them seemed to be moving due north at this time, but very slowly while the other lagged behind a bit- so they were approx and inch apart if you put your fingers to the sky to measure. then both lights headed north, after that brief pause.

watching them, i wondered why i could look at such a bright/brilliant light and not have it hurt my eyes. the lights continued to move north for a few more seconds and then they were gone...Didn't fade away slowly, didn't change directions...Just gone. in a blink of an eye....Literally.

i feel honored that i was able to witness another ufo and wondered if anyone on the beach that night saw them too.....
content.summary: Saw two bright lights hovering, then moving slowly, then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gone to dinner with my mother and younger sister. i was behind the wheel on the way home, my mom in the passenger seat and my sister in the backseat. we reached our community at 7:00pm and started driving up the hill towards our home. the angle of the hill allows us to see much of the sky. the sky is very clear tonight 11/2/10. my mom said "look that must be a planet, i wonder what planet it is?" (the object was very bright like that of a planet no blinking lights were visible it was just a very bright white light identical to a very bright star). it was out the front of the windshield nearly overhead west of the car. i looked up at it and said "i don't know..." i examined it for a moment and noticed that while a star near it was stationary it was moving closer to the star but i wasn't sure if it was moving since we were also moving. next, it moved quickly across the sky towards the north, north-east on a straight path. i speculated that it was "probably a satellite" and at the top of the hill i stopped the car completely to watch it. we watched as it sped up and into the distance. my younger sister had her window open and heard no sound coming from the object. it then swerved severely left and then severely right and then left again and right before i saw it vanish completely as if the light was turned off (not as if it had faded into the distance). we have no explanation for it, as our initial thought was that it was a satellite, but once it swerved that had to be ruled out and the fact that it was nearly overhead and no sound was coming from it meant that it could not be a helicopter or plane. we live in a populated area so i'm hoping others report seeing this so we can figure out what it is, whether it be military aircraft or i dunno.
content.summary: Star-like ufo follows straight pattern then swerves violently several times and vanishes

content.detailedDescription: Seattle, wa. my friend and i were on my front porch smoking a cigarette, looking at the planes flying over head, when i noticed a light that looked a lot like a satellite coming over the horizon.  i thought it was weird because most of the time you can not see satellite's in seattle. it had a white/reddish hue to it. it was moving quite fast, and instead of making a straight line like a satellite does, it made more of an arc towards the big dipper constellation. as it got to the middle portion of the big dipper, it faded away. it was not a instant disappearance, there was a 2-3 second period where it had faded to about half of its original luminosity, then it slowly faded away. my friend and i were in awe, after it was gone.
content.summary: Small white reddish ball appeared on the horizon made a very large arc then disapeared in front of the big dipper.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on the new jersey turnpike at approximately 9pm on sunday night oct 31. at ths time i was somewhere between exits 5 and 7. my girlfriend was on the passengers side. there was a steady flow of traffic, but the highway was not crowded. through the windshield i suddenly noticed what i can best describe as a green spot streaking through the sky. it was directly in my field of vision, moving away from my car. given that i was travelling north on the turnpike, i concluded that the green dot was also travelling in a northerly direction. after just a few seconds, the dot disappeared. there was no explosion or burst of light. it just disappeared. there were numerous airplanes in the sky both before and after this event, and they were easily identified as airplanes. this green object was clearly no airplane. the most striking aspect of this experience was the considerable speed with which this green dot was moving. i was not able to ascertain the approximate height of the dot, but it was obvious that it was travelling very fast. it travelled in a smooth trajectory, with no stops, turns, or twists. i had no idea what this dot could have been, but it wasn't like anything that i'd ever seen before. my initial reaction was one of confusion, again not knowing how to begin to explain why i had just seen. my girlfriend had been nodding off at the time. as soon as i saw the dot i yelled over to her, but unfortunately by the time she perked up the dot had disappeared.
content.summary: Green flash of light travelling north, then disappearing after a few seconds.
